posts.post_title: SOLD: Old Judge Book - The Photographic Cards of Goodwin & Company (1886-1890)
posts.post_content:
SOLD.

$65 shipped, PayPal preferred.

Up for sale is my copy of The Photographic Cards of Goodwin & Company (1886-1890.)  This book is an excellent reference for all things Goodwin.  It is in like new condition, with only minor dust jacket wear.
